channel.title: Fp on David Raab
channel.description: Recent content in Fp on David Raab

item.title: OOP is Partial Application
item.description: In the past I spent a lot of time in different online forums, websites and so on. As I am interested in general about language design and learnt a lot of languages I also had many discussions with different programmers of different knowledge. As I started programming with QBasic and C I am also used to procedural programming. The same goes for Perl. As of Perl 5 (1994) it also contains object-oriented programming, but still some parts of it are procedural.

item.title: Functions are interfaces
item.description: When I started to learn C# around 2013 there were certainly new things I came into contact. Some of them had todo with the fact that I primarily used Perl, a dynamic typed language, but in some sense the language features of Perl were also far ahead of C# back then, leading to different solutions and how you use a language. Back at that time I realised that a lot of programmers were into a “newly” thing.
